00015 
00016 #include "LogNormalShadowing.h"
00017 
00018 #include "Mapping.h"
00019 #include "AirFrame_m.h"
00020 
00021 LogNormalShadowing::LogNormalShadowing(double mean, double stdDev, simtime_t_cref interval):
00022   mean(mean), stdDev(stdDev), interval(interval)
00023 { }
00024 
00025 LogNormalShadowing::~LogNormalShadowing() {}
00026 
00027 double LogNormalShadowing::randomLogNormalGain() const {
00028   return FWMath::dBm2mW(-1.0 * normal(mean, stdDev));
00029 }
00030 
00031 void LogNormalShadowing::filterSignal(AirFrame *frame, const Coord& /*sendersPos*/, const Coord& /*receiverPos*/) {
00032   Signal&   signal = frame->getSignal();
00033   simtime_t start  = signal.getReceptionStart();
00034   simtime_t end    = signal.getReceptionEnd();
00035   Mapping*  att    = MappingUtils::createMapping(DimensionSet::timeDomain, Mapping::LINEAR);
00036 
00037   Argument pos;
00038 
00039   for(simtime_t t = start; t <= end; t += interval)
00040   {
00041     pos.setTime(t);
00042     att->appendValue(pos, randomLogNormalGain());
00043   }
00044 
00045   signal.addAttenuation(att);
00046 }
